name: Hide Party
description:
Hide Party is a game about someone who has social anxiety. Player has been dragged into a student party where they didn’t want to go but their friend insisted. At the party, they are trying to leave as soon as possible but they just can’t say “no” to people when they ask for favors or help. In this game they try to survive whilst helping their friend to find their phone and not to lose their own mind while doing so.

Controls:
  • WASD / Arrow keys - Move
  • E - Interact with NPCs and objects
  • Space (while talking) - Continue dialogue
  • ESC - Open pause menu / Quit

The game was created as a student project. It's only a demo and unfortunately we aren't going to continue developing this.

Team:

  • Laura Huovinen - Programmer, Character Design & Animation
  • Mari - Graphic Design, Level Design
  • Pere - Graphic Design, Story
